lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Washington wants other major nations to establish specific policy goals for economic growth, inflation, current account balance of payments, trade balances, budget performance, monetary conditions and currencies.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The Treasury Secretary is expected to see Japanese Finance Minister Kiichi Miyazawa, West German Finance Minister Gerhard Stoltenberg and British Chancellor of the Exchequer Nigel Lawson.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Monetary sources said the so-called Group of 24 developing nations are preparing a very tough communique which brands the western strategy for shoring up the debt strategy as a failure.
